item.description: ğŸ§ I am an Audio DSP and Machine Learning Engineer currently focused on applying artificial intelligence in the embedded audio industry. ğŸ‘ï¸ I also possess experience in end-to-end computer vision projects and applying AI in the healthcare sector, particularly for ALS patient analysis and prognosis. ğŸ—£ï¸ In my Acoustic Engineering thesis project, I am developing a voice cloning system for the Rioplatense Spanish dialect, capable of synthesizing high-quality speech in real time with detailed control over pitch and phoneme duration.
